body:
Basically if you play on hypixel and have /friends on there you will be able to see when they join and leave

This would mean that you can see if your /friends on the forums join the server!

-Ryan ;D
body_tagged:

title: [SUG] Showing when your friends join

replies.body:
I believe chatting on the forums was turned down because it would be yet another area for the staff to constantly moderate.

Considering we already have three platforms + Skype for communication, I'm pretty sure it was turned down because it was unneeded as opposed to the staff just being lazy.
